gobblin.source.extractor.extract

Interface ProtocolSpecificLayer<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - type of data record
    S - type of schema
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcExtractor, MysqlExtractor, QueryBasedExtractor, RestApiExtractor, SqlServerExtractor

    public interface ProtocolSpecificLayer<S,D>
    An interface for protocol extractors

      • getHourPredicateCondition

        String getHourPredicateCondition(String column,
                                 long value,
                                 String valueFormat,
                                 String operator)
        date predicate condition for types like timestamp and date
        Returns:
        predicate condition (LastModifiedHour >= 10 and LastModifiedHour <= 20)

      • getDatePredicateCondition

        String getDatePredicateCondition(String column,
                                 long value,
                                 String valueFormat,
                                 String operator)
        date predicate condition for types like timestamp and date
        Returns:
        predicate condition (LastModifiedDate >= 2014-01-01 and LastModifiedDate <= 2014-01-01)

      • getTimestampPredicateCondition

        String getTimestampPredicateCondition(String column,
                                      long value,
                                      String valueFormat,
                                      String operator)
        timestamp predicate condition for types like timestamp
        Returns:
        predicate condition (LastModifiedTimestamp >= 2014-01-01T00:00:00.000Z and LastModifiedTimestamp <= 2014-01-10T15:05:00.000Z)
